CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: For example , Takimiya and co-workers reported four different NDTn isomers as shown in Figure 1 , which allowed to create a broad variety of NDTn - based polymer semiconductor materials , and high OFET performance with mobility of up to 0.77 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 based on PNDT3BT was achieved.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| NDTn isomers |
| NDTn |
| polymer semiconductor materials |
| PNDT3BT |

Note: I have assumed that "NDTn" and "PNDT3BT" are specific types of materials, and included them in the table. If they are not materials, then they should not be included in the table.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I have determined that "NDTn isomers" and "PNDT3BT" are the only clear "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. Here is the table with these entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| NDTn isomers |
| PNDT3BT |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: For example , Takimiya and co-workers reported four different NDTn isomers as shown in Figure 1 , which allowed to create a broad variety of NDTn - based polymer semiconductor materials , and high OFET performance with mobility of up to 0.77 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 based on PNDT3BT was achieved.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| NDTn isomers |
| high OFET performance |
| mobility of up to 0.77 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |
| PNDT3BT |

Note: I have assumed that "NDTn", "OFET", and "PNDT3BT" are specific names or types of materials or components, and "high" is used to modify the performance level. If "high OFET performance" is considered as a single entity, then there will be only two entities in the table.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I have identified the following "Material Property" entities:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| mobility of up to 0.77 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |

Note: I have removed "NDTn isomers" and "high OFET performance" as they do not clearly refer to material properties. "NDTn isomers" may refer to a type of material, but it is not a specific material property. Similarly, "high OFET performance" is a descriptive term for a device's performance, but it is not a specific material property.
